title: How to Make a Ketchup and Molasses Based Bar B Que Sauce

steps.headline: In a medium saucepan heat oil.
steps.description: Add onions and sauté until they're translucent.

steps.headline: Add garlic to the mix.
steps.description: Make sure that you do not burn it.

steps.headline: Add chili powder to the mix.
steps.description: Cook for a minute or so to release the oils of the spice.

steps.headline: Add the wet ingredients to the mix.
steps.description: Let the sauce simmer. The longer, the better to release the flavors.

steps.headline: Finished!
steps.description: Remove from heat then store or serve right away. Optional: If you don't like chunky sauce, blend the sauce until it is smooth.

text: In a medium saucepan heat oil. Add onions and sauté until they're translucent. Add garlic to the mix. Make sure that you do not burn it. Add chili powder to the mix. Cook for a minute or so to release the oils of the spice. Add the wet ingredients to the mix. Let the sauce simmer. The longer, the better to release the flavors. Finished! Remove from heat then store or serve right away. Optional: If you don't like chunky sauce, blend the sauce until it is smooth.
